title: In One Breath (2003) The making of The Russian Ark
description:
In One Breath (2003) The making of The Russian Ark by Aleksandr Sokurov

Runtime 43 minutes 

In English with hardcoded subtitles

Written and Directed by Knut Eistermann

  My notes

  There are many file shares for Aleksandr Sokurov's The Russian Ark.

  In One Breath is the documentary of the making of this film.  It is not available anywhere else from the torrent search I have made before doing this encode.

  The documentary details the extraordinary event of a film of 96 minutes with a cast of thousands portraying 300 years of history in one uninterrupted shot of film.  These details are as astounding as the experience of watching The Russian Ark itself.

   Elsewhere in my torrent collection I have other "making of" films that you can peruse.  As someone who was once involved in the making of theatre I present these  pieces on how theater and opera and, by extension, film works as inspiration for others who are just beginning in the craft.  It is often forgotten that theatre and film comprise many arts and films such as In One Breath are the priceless record of the making of this art.

  Notes written  February 2, 2014
